display_information.name: SpinBot
display_information.description: Randomly selects a user from a thread to decide who's turn it is. Use: @SpinBot who/wer has to...?
display_information.long_description: SpinBot is a fun and fair way to randomly select a user from a Slack thread. Perfect for deciding who has to pre-order lunch, get coffee, or take on any other task. Simply use the /spinbot command in a thread with a task description, and the bot will randomly pick someone from the thread participants.
